modName: Cows give you Milk and Brew your own Mead
summary: My mod allows you to milk the cows in game, getting (guess what)  MILK!  Also adds a small boilery to every major inn in the game so you can brew your own ale, mead, and other alcohols i'm currently working on.
descriptionHtml:
This mod does it all. A small quest that allows you to milk the cows in the game. A recipe for cheese so you can make it from that milk. A recipe for honey so you can make it from that useless honeycomb, and a Crafting Station for making Alcohol, so you can use your honey to make something other than honey-nut treats.

I've been posted on steam for a while and had a lot of people requesting a nexus download so here it is.
#1 Mod on STEAM Most popular for a week running now. Hopefully I can keep it up and the nexus community likes it just as much.

Currently on Version 2.0 which added the brewing Crafting station and recipes.

Next update will include more domestic goats in the world. Goat milk that you can harvest, plus goat cheese recipes. Plus some other adds that I'm working on.

Keep Tuned for more.
author: LordLuco aka Stephen Luco
